backend/main.mo: Defines hotel, ticket, bundle, comparison, and user profile types plus access‑controlled user profile queries in a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend components, pages, hooks, and logic.
frontend/.env.capacitor.example: Example Capacitor environment file showing required CAPACITOR_SERVER_URL configuration.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android project build artifacts, IDE files, and keystores.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app Gradle config defining SDK versions, build types, dependencies, and Capacitor plugin setup.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest configuring app metadata, main activity, FileProvider, and required permissions.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/e: Main Capacitor activity extending BridgeActivity with default onCreate.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon definition using shared drawables.
Adaptive launcher icon referencing background and foreground drawables.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: String resources defining app name, activity title, package name, and URL scheme.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle build file defining repositories, plugin classpaths, and a clean task.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Project-wide Gradle settings enabling AndroidX and Jetifier with JVM args.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Settings file including app and Capacitor Android modules.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, web directory, server URL, and Android options.
frontend/docs/android.md: Comprehensive Android guide covering PWA install steps, APK build instructions, environment setup, and troubleshooting.
frontend/docs/README.md: Docs index linking to Android installation guide and instructions for PWA and APK usage.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the app root and main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app metadata, icons, shortcuts, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with basic styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first fetch handling with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main app router, routes, theme provider, and registers the service worker.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Defines the candid IDL schema for backend types including users, groups, albums, hotels, tickets, and comparisons.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling login, logout, navigation, and error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to set a screen name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard component that restricts access to authenticated users and handles redirects.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnauthSignI: Displays a sign‑in screen with branding, login button, and error handling for Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/groups/ChatPanel: Renders a chat UI with message list, auto‑scrolling, and message input supporting Enter‑to‑send.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper with top nav, footer, route‑based backgrounds, and title/background preloading effects.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Shows a footer with copyright, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Navigation bar with branding, conditional auth links, mobile menu, and profile access.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoGrid: Displays photo thumbnails with tagging and delete actions, plus a panel for tagging people.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoUplo: Handles selecting and uploading photos with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/memory/TagPeople: Dialog for adding, removing, and saving manual person tags on a photo.
frontend/src/components/offers/HotelOffe: UI component to add, edit, and remove hotel offers with room and pricing details.
frontend/src/components/offers/TicketOff: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of ticket offers including type, price, and currency.
frontend/src/components/offers/Transport: Editor for adding and removing transportation offers with mode, provider, class, and pricing.
frontend/src/components/offers/VipOffers: Handles creation and modification of VIP packages including price, currency, and inclusions.
frontend/src/components/profile/LegalNam: Displays and updates a user's private legal name with save functionality and loading states.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineStatu: Shows a banner indicating offline or restored-online status based on browser connectivity events.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleCa: Renders a detailed bundle comparison card with pricing, ticket, hotel, and transport info, highlighting planned or upgraded choices.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleSo: Provides a dropdown UI for sorting bundles by price or hotel rating.
frontend/src/components/safety/PurchaseC: Gates children behind authentication and parental consent checks, allowing users to confirm permission before viewing purchase options.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines app branding values including name, tagline, and logo asset paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, permissions, legal info, friends, and trip-related backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and route background styling.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Formats numbers as fixed‑precision currency strings using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/lib/localComparisonEngine.t: Generates ticket–hotel–VIP–transport bundles with cost calculations and finds the cheapest transport option.
frontend/src/lib/pwa/registerServiceWork: Registers a service worker in production and periodically checks for updates.
frontend/src/lib/routeBackgrounds.ts: Maps routes to background images and resolves inherited backgrounds for nested paths.
frontend/src/lib/tripWindow.ts: Computes check‑in and check‑out timestamps based on a concert date and buffer days.
frontend/src/lib/upgradeDetection.ts: Rates bundle components and detects cheaper higher‑quality alternatives for tickets, transport, and rooms.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumPage.tsx: Displays an album with photo upload, deletion, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Shows group details with chat, leaving the group, and message posting.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Lists user groups, creates new groups, and handles unauthenticated access.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing branding, hero section, feature steps, and navigation buttons to start a trip or view saved trips.
frontend/src/pages/InstallAndroidPage.ts: Provides instructions for installing the app on Android via PWA or APK, including steps, alerts, and feature notes.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryFinderPage.tsx: Lists user photo albums, allows creating new albums, and handles unauthenticated states and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile info, legal name section, and saved trip comparisons with options to delete entries.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Generates and sorts trip bundles, displays upgrade options, and lets users save a selected comparison.
Displays saved trip comparisons, handles loading and unauthenticated states, and supports deleting a comparison with confirmation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Redirects authenticated users to their profile and shows the UnauthSignInScreen for sign‑in when no identity is present.
frontend/src/pages/TripBuilderPage.tsx: Provides a form-driven interface for entering event and travel details, editing offer options, and navigating to results for comparison.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build files, enabling ESNext modules and composite builds for vite.config.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite setup with React, env handling, path aliases, dev server proxying, and enforced Internet Identity provider URL.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, branding direction, architecture notes, known issues, and feature inventory for the concert‑travel comparison app.
